meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kevin McGinty Jamie Newland Deborah Beams Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7511.

td.p: Kevin McGinty, an account representative from Randolph, Vermont
Jamie Newland, a loan coordinator from Chicago, Illinois
Deborah Beams, a certified public accountant from Dallas, Texas (whose 2-day cash winnings total $23,300)

tr.td: THE MARVEL UNIVERSE
BODY PART TITLES
THIS CATEGORY IS JUST FLUFF
2016 PRESIDENTIAL MEDAL OF FREEDOM RECIPIENTS
GET A LYFT WITH UBER
(Alex: Each correct response will be two words, three letters each word.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'His marvel.com bio says he\'s "highly proficient in hand-to-hand combat, swordsmanship and hammer throwing"')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
